# Aim


>###The aim of this workshop is enable you to thoughtfully implement machine learning methods, using R, to make data--driven decisions.

]

.pull-right4[

<br><br><br><br>
<p align="center"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/therbootcamp/therbootcamp.github.io/master/_sessions/_image/target.png" height="350"></p>

]

.pull-left45[
# Setting expectations


<h2>What we <i>will</i> cover</h2>

- Intro to the fundamentals of ML
- Intro to using R for ML
- Intro to common ML models
- Opportunity to learn by doing
- Opportunity to discuss and share knowledge.

<h2>What we will <i>NOT</i> cover</h2>

- In depth, advanced discussions of any of these topics.

]

# Schedule 

We have an <high>ambitious schedule</high>!

- 2 days, 3 sessions per day, 1.5 - 2 hours per session, on a variety of topics.

- Each session contains a slide-based <high>introduction</high> and a hands-on <high>programming interactive or practical</high>

<br>


]

# Introduction

<high>30 - 60 minutes</high> slide based introduction to help you understand the basic concepts, including:
<br><br>
&emsp;&emsp;1 - Theory<br>
&emsp;&emsp;2 - Code examples<br>
&emsp;&emsp;3 - Live demonstrations<br> 
<br><br>


<high>All available online</high>. Follow along, and don't worry about memorizing

<br><br>
<a href="https://therbootcamp.github.io/appliedML_2019Jan/">This is a Link to our materials</a>.
<br><br>

Be interactive! Ask questions!

]

.pull-left45[

# Practicals

<high>Write your own R scripts!</high>

- Anywhere from 10 ~ 30 programming tasks.

- Starts easy, gets progressively more challenging.

- Go at your own pace and finish as much as you can.

    - We have a diverse group with different backgrounds and interests, we love that!

- Be active! Ask questions!

- We'll give you all the answers later.

]

# Stay positive and ask for help!

- Learning a computer language is <high>hard</high>.

- Learning the basics of machine learning can be just as <high>hard</high>.

- <high>Take breaks when you need them</high>, and don't get discouraged!

- We're here to help!

]
